item.title: Court Wizzard change
item.dc:creator: anon98616575
item.description:
Unfortunately, King’s whole base is that he is unable to be investigated. That will never change.

Court Wizard’s abilities effectively protect revealed BD that are considered vital. Sheriff found the Unseen? CW can ensure they aren’t converted. Psychic keeping the Prince and Noble in connection? Protected. Prince possibly attacked tonight? Protected.

I’m sorry not every role is a fun killing role with super powers. CW, Noble, Psychic… these “boring” roles are unsung heroes that are necessary for the balance in this game. If you play the game as intended, and socialize, you will find CW to be an enjoyable experience.
